title: Getting Started with omophub
text: omophub package provides R interface OMOPHub API accessing OHDSI ATHENA standardized medical vocabularies. vignette demonstrates basic usage patterns.

title: Getting Started with omophub
text: package requires API key OMOPHub. Set API key environment variable: add .Renviron file persistence:

title: Getting Started with omophub
code: library(omophub)  # Create client (reads API key from environment) client <- OMOPHubClient$new()  # Or provide API key explicitly client <- OMOPHubClient$new(api_key = "your_api_key")  # With additional options client <- OMOPHubClient$new(   api_key = "your_api_key",   timeout = 30,   max_retries = 3,   vocab_version = "2025.1" )

title: Getting Started with omophub
text: Retrieve concept OMOP concept ID: Get concept vocabulary-specific code:
code: concept <- client$concepts$get(201826) print(concept$concept_name) # [1] "Type 2 diabetes mellitus" concept <- client$concepts$get_by_code("SNOMED", "44054006") print(concept$concept_name) # [1] "Type 2 diabetes mellitus"

title: Getting Started with omophub
code: result <- client$concepts$batch(c(201826, 4329847, 1112807)) for (concept in result$concepts) {   cat(sprintf("%s: %s\n", concept$concept_id, concept$concept_name)) }

title: Getting Started with omophub
code: results <- client$search$basic("diabetes mellitus", page_size = 10) for (concept in results$data) {   cat(sprintf("%s: %s\n", concept$concept_id, concept$concept_name)) } results <- client$search$basic(   "heart attack",   vocabulary_ids = "SNOMED",   domain_ids = "Condition",   page_size = 20 )

title: Getting Started with omophub
code: suggestions <- client$concepts$suggest("diab", page_size = 5) for (s in suggestions$suggestions) {   print(s$suggestion) }

title: Getting Started with omophub
code: # First page results <- client$search$basic("diabetes", page = 1, page_size = 50)  # Check pagination info print(results$meta$total_items) print(results$meta$has_next)  # Get next page if available if (isTRUE(results$meta$has_next)) {   page2 <- client$search$basic("diabetes", page = 2, page_size = 50) }

title: Getting Started with omophub
code: all_results <- client$search$basic_all(   "diabetes",   page_size = 100,   max_pages = 5,   progress = TRUE )  # Results are a tibble print(nrow(all_results)) print(names(all_results))

title: Getting Started with omophub
text: Get ancestors (parent concepts): Get descendants (child concepts):
code: result <- client$hierarchy$ancestors(201826, max_levels = 3) for (ancestor in result$ancestors) {   print(ancestor$concept_name) } result <- client$hierarchy$descendants(201826, max_levels = 2) for (descendant in result$descendants) {   print(descendant$concept_name) }

title: Getting Started with omophub
text: Find concept maps vocabularies: Map specific vocabularies:
code: result <- client$mappings$get(201826) for (mapping in result$mappings) {   cat(sprintf("%s: %s\n",               mapping$target_vocabulary_id,               mapping$target_concept_name)) } result <- client$mappings$get(   201826,   target_vocabulary = "ICD10CM" )

title: Getting Started with omophub
code: tryCatch(   {     concept <- client$concepts$get(999999999)   },   omophub_not_found = function(e) {     message("Concept not found: ", e$message)   },   omophub_api_error = function(e) {     message("API error: ", e$message)   } )

title: Getting Started with omophub
text: OMOPHub API Documentation Package Documentation GitHub Repository

code: @Manual{,   title = {omophub: R Client for the 'OMOPHub' Medical Vocabulary API},   author = {Alex Chen},   year = {2026},   note = {R package version 1.3.0},   url = {https://github.com/omopHub/omophub-R}, }

what: R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API
title: R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API
text: Query millions standardized medical concepts R Access SNOMED CT, ICD-10, RxNorm, LOINC, 90+ OHDSI ATHENA vocabularies without downloading, installing, maintaining local databases.  Documentation · API Reference · Examples

title: R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API
text: Working OHDSI ATHENA vocabularies traditionally requires downloading multi-gigabyte files, setting database, writing complex SQL queries. OMOPHub eliminates friction.

title: R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API
code: # Install from CRAN install.packages("omophub")  # Or install development version from GitHub # install.packages("pak") pak::pak("omopHub/omophub-R")

title: R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API
code: library(omophub)  # Option 1: Environment variable (recommended) Sys.setenv(OMOPHUB_API_KEY = "oh_xxxxxxxxx")  # Option 2: Use helper function set_api_key("oh_xxxxxxxxx")  # Option 3: Store securely in system keyring set_api_key("oh_xxxxxxxxx", store = "keyring")

title: R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API
code: library(omophub)  # Create client client <- OMOPHubClient$new()  # Get a concept by ID concept <- client$concepts$get(201826) concept$concept_name # [1] "Type 2 diabetes mellitus"  # Search for concepts results <- client$search$basic("metformin", vocabulary_ids = "RxNorm") results$data  # Get concept by vocabulary code snomed_concept <- client$concepts$get_by_code("SNOMED", "44054006")  # Map to another vocabulary mappings <- client$mappings$get(201826, target_vocabulary = "ICD10CM")  # Navigate hierarchy ancestors <- client$hierarchy$ancestors(201826, max_levels = 3)

title: R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API
text: Validate map clinical codes OMOP CDM transformations:
code: # Validate source codes and find standard equivalents validate_and_map <- function(source_vocab, source_code) {   concept <- client$concepts$get_by_code(source_vocab, source_code)      if (concept$standard_concept != "S") {     mappings <- client$mappings$get(       concept$concept_id,       target_vocabulary = "SNOMED"     )     return(mappings$mappings[[1]]$target_concept_id)   }      concept$concept_id }  # Example: Map ICD-10 to SNOMED standard_id <- validate_and_map("ICD10CM", "E11.9")

title: R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API
code: # Check if condition codes are valid condition_codes <- c("E11.9", "I10", "J44.9")  for (code in condition_codes) {   tryCatch({     concept <- client$concepts$get_by_code("ICD10CM", code)     message(sprintf("OK %s: %s", code, concept$concept_name))   }, omophub_api_error = function(e) {     message(sprintf("ERROR %s: Invalid code!", code))   }) }

title: R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API
text: Explore hierarchies build comprehensive concept sets:
code: # Get all descendants for phenotype definition descendants <- client$hierarchy$descendants(   201826,  # Type 2 diabetes mellitus   max_levels = 5 )  concept_set <- sapply(descendants$concepts, function(x) x$concept_id) message(sprintf("Found %d concepts for T2DM phenotype", length(concept_set)))

title: R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API
code: library(dplyr) library(purrr)  # Search and convert to tibble results <- client$search$basic("hypertension", page_size = 100)  concepts_df <- results$data %>%   map_dfr(~ tibble(     concept_id = .x$concept_id,     concept_name = .x$concept_name,     vocabulary_id = .x$vocabulary_id,     domain_id = .x$domain_id   ))  # Filter and analyze concepts_df %>%   filter(vocabulary_id == "SNOMED") %>%   count(domain_id)

title: R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API
code: # Automatic pagination - fetch all results all_results <- client$search$basic_all("diabetes", page_size = 100)  # Manual pagination page1 <- client$search$basic("diabetes", page = 1, page_size = 20) page2 <- client$search$basic("diabetes", page = 2, page_size = 20)

title: R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API
code: # Specify vocabulary version client <- OMOPHubClient$new(vocab_version = "2025.2")  # Custom configuration client <- OMOPHubClient$new(   api_key = "oh_xxx",   base_url = "https://api.omophub.com/v1",   timeout = 30 )

title: R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API
code: tryCatch({   result <- client$concepts$get(999999999) }, omophub_not_found_error = function(e) {   message("Concept not found: ", conditionMessage(e)) }, omophub_auth_error = function(e) {   message("Check your API key") }, omophub_rate_limit_error = function(e) {   message("Rate limited, please wait") }, omophub_api_error = function(e) {   message("API error: ", conditionMessage(e)) })

title: R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API
text: Best : R users need quick, programmatic access OMOP vocabularies without infrastructure overhead.

title: R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API
text: package includes comprehensive examples inst/examples/: Run example:

title: R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API
text: Full Documentation API Reference Examples Get API Key

code: # Clone and install for development # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("omopHub/omophub-R")  # Run tests devtools::test()  # Check package devtools::check()

title: R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API

title: R Client for the OMOPHub Medical Vocabulary API

title: Concepts Resource — ConceptsResource
text: R6 class providing access concept operations.

title: Concepts Resource — ConceptsResource
text: list containing concept data. list containing concept data optional relationships synonyms. list concepts failures. list suggestions pagination metadata. Related concepts relationship scores. Relationships data. Recommendations grouped source concept ID pagination metadata.

title: Concepts Resource — ConceptsResource
text: ConceptsResource$new() ConceptsResource$get() ConceptsResource$get_by_code() ConceptsResource$batch() ConceptsResource$suggest() ConceptsResource$related() ConceptsResource$relationships() ConceptsResource$recommended() ConceptsResource$print() ConceptsResource$clone()

title: Concepts Resource — ConceptsResource
code: ConceptsResource$get(   concept_id,   include_relationships = FALSE,   include_synonyms = FALSE,   include_hierarchy = FALSE,   vocab_release = NULL )

title: Concepts Resource — ConceptsResource
text: concept_id OMOP concept ID. include_relationships Include related concepts (parents/children). Default FALSE. include_synonyms Include concept synonyms. Default FALSE. include_hierarchy Include hierarchy information. Default FALSE. vocab_release Specific vocabulary release (e.g., "2025.2"). Default NULL.

title: Concepts Resource — ConceptsResource
code: ConceptsResource$get_by_code(   vocabulary_id,   concept_code,   include_relationships = FALSE,   include_synonyms = FALSE,   include_hierarchy = FALSE,   vocab_release = NULL )

title: Concepts Resource — ConceptsResource
text: vocabulary_id vocabulary ID (e.g., "SNOMED", "ICD10CM"). concept_code concept code within vocabulary. include_relationships Include related concepts (parents/children). Default FALSE. include_synonyms Include concept synonyms. Default FALSE. include_hierarchy Include hierarchy information. Default FALSE. vocab_release Specific vocabulary release (e.g., "2025.2"). Default NULL.

title: Concepts Resource — ConceptsResource
code: ConceptsResource$batch(   concept_ids,   include_relationships = FALSE,   include_synonyms = FALSE,   include_mappings = FALSE,   vocabulary_filter = NULL,   standard_only = TRUE )

title: Concepts Resource — ConceptsResource
text: concept_ids Vector concept IDs (max 100). include_relationships Include related concepts. Default FALSE. include_synonyms Include concept synonyms. Default FALSE. include_mappings Include concept mappings. Default FALSE. vocabulary_filter Filter results specific vocabularies. standard_only return standard concepts. Default TRUE.

title: Concepts Resource — ConceptsResource
code: ConceptsResource$suggest(   query,   page = 1,   page_size = 10,   vocabulary_ids = NULL,   domain_ids = NULL,   vocab_release = NULL )

title: Concepts Resource — ConceptsResource
text: query Search query (min 2 characters, max 100 characters). page Page number (default 1). page_size Number suggestions per page (default 10, max 100). vocabulary_ids Filter specific vocabularies (character vector). domain_ids Filter specific domains (character vector). vocab_release Specific vocabulary release (e.g., "2025.2").

title: Concepts Resource — ConceptsResource
code: ConceptsResource$related(   concept_id,   relationship_types = NULL,   min_score = NULL,   page_size = 20,   vocab_release = NULL )

title: Concepts Resource — ConceptsResource
text: concept_id source concept ID. relationship_types Filter relationship types (e.g., c("", "Maps ")). min_score Minimum relationship score (0.0-1.0). page_size Maximum number results (default 20, max 100). vocab_release Specific vocabulary release (e.g., "2025.1").

title: Concepts Resource — ConceptsResource
code: ConceptsResource$relationships(   concept_id,   relationship_ids = NULL,   vocabulary_ids = NULL,   domain_ids = NULL,   include_invalid = FALSE,   standard_only = FALSE,   include_reverse = FALSE,   vocab_release = NULL )

title: Concepts Resource — ConceptsResource
text: concept_id concept ID. relationship_ids Filter relationship type IDs (character vector comma-separated string). vocabulary_ids Filter target vocabulary IDs (character vector comma-separated string). domain_ids Filter target domain IDs (character vector comma-separated string). include_invalid Include relationships invalid concepts. Default FALSE. standard_only include relationships standard concepts. Default FALSE. include_reverse Include reverse relationships. Default FALSE. vocab_release Specific vocabulary release version. Default NULL.

title: Concepts Resource — ConceptsResource
text: Get recommended concepts using OHDSI Phoebe algorithm.

title: Concepts Resource — ConceptsResource
code: ConceptsResource$recommended(   concept_ids,   relationship_types = NULL,   vocabulary_ids = NULL,   domain_ids = NULL,   standard_only = TRUE,   include_invalid = FALSE,   page = 1,   page_size = 100 )

title: Concepts Resource — ConceptsResource
text: concept_ids Vector source concept IDs (1-100). relationship_types Filter relationship types (max 20). vocabulary_ids Filter specific vocabularies (max 50). domain_ids Filter specific domains (max 50). standard_only return standard concepts. Default TRUE. include_invalid Include invalid/deprecated concepts. Default FALSE. page Page number. Default 1. page_size Results per page (default 100, max 1000).

title: Domains Resource — DomainsResource

text: include_stats Include concept counts vocabulary coverage. Default FALSE.

title: Hierarchy Resource — HierarchyResource
text: R6 class providing access hierarchy operations (ancestors descendants).

title: Hierarchy Resource — HierarchyResource
text: concept_id concept ID. format Response format - "flat" (default) "graph" visualization. vocabulary_ids Filter specific vocabularies (character vector). domain_ids Filter specific domains (character vector). max_levels Maximum hierarchy levels traverse directions (default 10). max_results Maximum results per direction performance optimization. relationship_types Relationship types follow (default: ""). include_invalid Include deprecated/invalid concepts. Default FALSE.

text: concept_id concept ID. vocabulary_ids Filter specific vocabularies (character vector). max_levels Maximum hierarchy levels traverse. relationship_types Relationship types follow (default: ""). include_paths Include path information. Default FALSE. include_distance Include distance source. Default TRUE. include_invalid Include deprecated/invalid concepts. Default FALSE. page Page number. Default 1. page_size Results per page. Default 100.

code: HierarchyResource$descendants(   concept_id,   vocabulary_ids = NULL,   max_levels = 10,   relationship_types = NULL,   include_distance = TRUE,   include_paths = FALSE,   include_invalid = FALSE,   domain_ids = NULL,   page = 1,   page_size = 100 )

text: concept_id concept ID. vocabulary_ids Filter specific vocabularies (character vector). max_levels Maximum hierarchy levels (default 10, max 20). relationship_types Relationship types follow. include_distance Include distance source. Default TRUE. include_paths Include path information. Default FALSE. include_invalid Include deprecated/invalid concepts. Default FALSE. domain_ids Filter domains. page Page number. Default 1. page_size Results per page. Default 100.

title: Mappings Resource — MappingsResource
code: MappingsResource$get(   concept_id,   target_vocabulary = NULL,   include_invalid = FALSE,   vocab_release = NULL )

title: Mappings Resource — MappingsResource
text: concept_id concept ID. target_vocabulary Filter specific target vocabulary (e.g., "ICD10CM"). include_invalid Include invalid/deprecated mappings. Default FALSE. vocab_release Specific vocabulary release version (e.g., "2025.1"). Default NULL.

code: MappingsResource$map(   source_concepts,   target_vocabulary,   mapping_type = NULL,   include_invalid = FALSE,   vocab_release = NULL )

title: Mappings Resource — MappingsResource
text: source_concepts Vector OMOP concept IDs map. target_vocabulary Target vocabulary ID (e.g., "ICD10CM", "SNOMED"). mapping_type Mapping type (direct, equivalent, broader, narrower). include_invalid Include invalid mappings. Default FALSE. vocab_release Specific vocabulary release version (e.g., "2025.1"). Default NULL.

title: OMOPHub API Client — OMOPHubClient
text: R6 class interacting OMOPHub vocabulary service. Provides access OHDSI ATHENA standardized medical vocabularies.

title: OMOPHub API Client — OMOPHubClient
text: client provides access resources: concepts: Concept lookup batch operations search: Basic advanced concept search vocabularies: Vocabulary listing details domains: Domain listing concept filtering hierarchy: Ancestor descendant navigation relationships: Concept relationships mappings: Concept mappings vocabularies

title: OMOPHub API Client — OMOPHubClient
text: concepts Access concept operations. search Access search operations. vocabularies Access vocabulary operations. domains Access domain operations. hierarchy Access hierarchy operations. relationships Access relationship operations. mappings Access mapping operations.

title: OMOPHub API Client — OMOPHubClient
code: OMOPHubClient$new(   api_key = NULL,   base_url = NULL,   timeout = 30,   max_retries = 3,   vocab_version = NULL )

title: OMOPHub API Client — OMOPHubClient
text: api_key API key authentication. provided, reads OMOPHUB_API_KEY environment variable system keyring. base_url API base URL. Defaults https://api.omophub.com/v1. timeout Request timeout seconds. Defaults 30. max_retries Maximum retry attempts failed requests. Defaults 3. vocab_version Optional vocabulary version (e.g., "2025.1"). specified, uses latest version.

title: OMOPHub API Client — OMOPHubClient
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Create client (uses OMOPHUB_API_KEY env var) client <- OMOPHubClient$new()  # Or with explicit API key client <- OMOPHubClient$new(api_key = "your_api_key")  # Search for concepts results <- client$search$basic("diabetes")  # Get a specific concept concept <- client$concepts$get(201826)  # Use specific vocabulary version client <- OMOPHubClient$new(vocab_version = "2025.1") } # }

title: Relationships Resource — RelationshipsResource
text: concept_id concept ID. relationship_ids Filter relationship type IDs (character vector comma-separated string). vocabulary_ids Filter target vocabulary IDs (character vector comma-separated string). domain_ids Filter target domain IDs (character vector comma-separated string). include_invalid Include relationships invalid concepts. Default FALSE. standard_only include relationships standard concepts. Default FALSE. include_reverse Include reverse relationships. Default FALSE. page Page number. Default 1. page_size Results per page (max 1000). Default 100. vocab_release Specific vocabulary release version. Default NULL.

text: Get available relationship types OMOP CDM.

title: Relationships Resource — RelationshipsResource
text: page Page number. Default 1. page_size Results per page (max 500). Default 100.

title: Search Resource — SearchResource
text: R6 class providing access search operations.

title: Search Resource — SearchResource
text: SearchResource$new() SearchResource$basic() SearchResource$basic_all() SearchResource$advanced() SearchResource$autocomplete() SearchResource$print() SearchResource$clone()

code: SearchResource$basic(   query,   vocabulary_ids = NULL,   domain_ids = NULL,   concept_class_ids = NULL,   standard_concept = NULL,   include_synonyms = FALSE,   include_invalid = FALSE,   min_score = NULL,   exact_match = FALSE,   page = 1,   page_size = 20,   sort_by = NULL,   sort_order = NULL )

title: Search Resource — SearchResource
text: query Search query string. vocabulary_ids Filter vocabulary IDs. domain_ids Filter domain IDs. concept_class_ids Filter concept class IDs. standard_concept Filter standard concept ("S", "C", NULL). include_synonyms Search synonyms. Default FALSE. include_invalid Include invalid concepts. Default FALSE. min_score Minimum relevance score. exact_match Require exact match. Default FALSE. page Page number (1-based). Default 1. page_size Results per page. Default 20. sort_by Sort field. sort_order Sort order ("asc" "desc").

code: SearchResource$advanced(   query,   vocabulary_ids = NULL,   domain_ids = NULL,   concept_class_ids = NULL,   standard_concepts_only = FALSE,   include_invalid = FALSE,   relationship_filters = NULL,   page = 1,   page_size = 20 )

title: Search Resource — SearchResource
text: query Search query string. vocabulary_ids Filter vocabulary IDs. domain_ids Filter domain IDs. concept_class_ids Filter concept class IDs. standard_concepts_only return standard concepts. Default FALSE. include_invalid Include invalid concepts. Default FALSE. relationship_filters Relationship-based filters. page Page number (1-based). Default 1. page_size Results per page. Default 20.

title: Vocabularies Resource — VocabulariesResource
text: R6 class providing access vocabulary operations.

title: Vocabularies Resource — VocabulariesResource
text: Paginated vocabulary list. Vocabulary details including vocabulary_id, vocabulary_name, vocabulary_reference, vocabulary_version, vocabulary_concept_id. Vocabulary statistics. Domain statistics including concept counts class breakdown. List available domains domain_id, domain_name, description. List available concept classes concept_class_id, concept_class_name, concept_class_concept_id. Paginated concepts.

title: Vocabularies Resource — VocabulariesResource
text: VocabulariesResource$new() VocabulariesResource$list() VocabulariesResource$get() VocabulariesResource$stats() VocabulariesResource$domain_stats() VocabulariesResource$domains() VocabulariesResource$concept_classes() VocabulariesResource$concepts() VocabulariesResource$print() VocabulariesResource$clone()

title: Vocabularies Resource — VocabulariesResource
code: VocabulariesResource$list(   include_stats = FALSE,   include_inactive = FALSE,   sort_by = "name",   sort_order = "asc",   page = 1,   page_size = 100 )

title: Vocabularies Resource — VocabulariesResource
text: include_stats Include vocabulary statistics. Default FALSE. include_inactive Include inactive vocabularies. Default FALSE. sort_by Sort field ("name", "priority", "updated"). Default "name". sort_order Sort order ("asc" "desc"). Default "asc". page Page number. Default 1. page_size Results per page. Default 100.

title: Vocabularies Resource — VocabulariesResource
text: Get statistics specific domain within vocabulary.

title: Vocabularies Resource — VocabulariesResource
text: vocabulary_id vocabulary ID (e.g., "SNOMED", "ICD10CM"). domain_id domain ID (e.g., "Condition", "Drug", "Procedure").

title: Vocabularies Resource — VocabulariesResource
code: VocabulariesResource$concepts(   vocabulary_id,   search = NULL,   standard_concept = "all",   include_invalid = FALSE,   include_relationships = FALSE,   include_synonyms = FALSE,   sort_by = "name",   sort_order = "asc",   page = 1,   page_size = 20 )

title: Vocabularies Resource — VocabulariesResource
text: vocabulary_id vocabulary ID. search Search term filter concepts name code. standard_concept Filter standard concept status ('S', 'C', ''). Default "". include_invalid Include invalid deprecated concepts. Default FALSE. include_relationships Include concept relationships. Default FALSE. include_synonyms Include concept synonyms. Default FALSE. sort_by Sort field ('name', 'concept_id', 'concept_code'). Default "name". sort_order Sort order ('asc' 'desc'). Default "asc". page Page number. Default 1. page_size Results per page (max 1000). Default 20.

what: omophub: R Client for the 'OMOPHub' Medical Vocabulary API — omophub-package
title: omophub: R Client for the 'OMOPHub' Medical Vocabulary API — omophub-package
text: Provides R interface 'OMOPHub' API accessing 'OHDSI ATHENA' standardized medical vocabularies. Supports concept search, vocabulary exploration, hierarchy navigation, relationship queries, concept mappings automatic pagination rate limiting. Provides R interface OMOPHub API accessing OHDSI ATHENA standardized medical vocabularies. Supports concept search, vocabulary exploration, hierarchy navigation, relationship queries, concept mappings automatic pagination rate limiting.

title: omophub: R Client for the 'OMOPHub' Medical Vocabulary API — omophub-package
text: main entry point OMOPHubClient R6 class provides access API resources:
code: library(omophub) client <- OMOPHubClient$new()  # Search for concepts results <- client$search$basic("diabetes")  # Get a specific concept concept <- client$concepts$get(201826)

title: omophub: R Client for the 'OMOPHub' Medical Vocabulary API — omophub-package
text: Set API key using one methods: Environment variable: OMOPHUB_API_KEY Explicit argument: OMOPHubClient$new(api_key = "your_key") Keyring: set_api_key("your_key", store = "keyring")

title: omophub: R Client for the 'OMOPHub' Medical Vocabulary API — omophub-package
text: client provides access resources: concepts: Concept lookup batch operations search: Basic advanced concept search vocabularies: Vocabulary listing details domains: Domain listing concept filtering hierarchy: Ancestor descendant navigation relationships: Concept relationships mappings: Concept mappings vocabularies

title: omophub: R Client for the 'OMOPHub' Medical Vocabulary API — omophub-package
text: Maintainer: Alex Chen alex@omophub.com [copyright holder] contributors: Observational Health Data Science Informatics [copyright holder]

text: Fetches pages results combines single tibble.

code: paginate_all(fetch_fn, page_size = 100, max_pages = Inf, progress = TRUE)

text: fetch_fn function takes page size arguments returns list data (results) meta (pagination metadata). page_size Number items per page. Default 100. max_pages Maximum number pages fetch. Default Inf. progress Show progress bar. Default TRUE.

title: Create Lazy Pagination Iterator — paginate_lazy
text: fetch_fn function takes page size arguments. page_size Number items per page. Default 100.

text: Parsed JSON response. paginated endpoints, returns list data (results) meta (pagination info). single-item endpoints, returns unwrapped data directly.

text: base_req Base request object. endpoint API endpoint path. body Named list JSON body. query Named list query parameters.

title: Perform POST Request — perform_post
text: Parsed JSON response (unwrapped data field present).

title: Set OMOPHub API Key — set_api_key
text: Stores OMOPHub API key specified location.

title: Set OMOPHub API Key — set_api_key
text: key API key store. store store key. One : "env": Set environment variable current session (default) "keyring": Store securely system keyring (requires keyring package)

title: Set OMOPHub API Key — set_api_key
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Store in environment (current session only) set_api_key("your_api_key")  # Store securely in keyring (persistent) set_api_key("your_api_key", store = "keyring") } # }

title: Validate Concept ID — validate_concept_id
text: concept_id concept ID validate. arg Argument name error messages. call calling environment.

title: Validate Page Parameters — validate_pagination
code: validate_pagination(   page,   page_size,   max_page_size = 1000,   call = rlang::caller_env() )

title: Validate Page Parameters — validate_pagination
text: page Page number. page_size Page size. max_page_size Maximum allowed page size. call calling environment.

title: omophub 1.3.0
text: Hierarchy get() method: New method retrieve complete concept hierarchy (ancestors descendants) single call support “flat” “graph” visualization formats. Vocabulary domain_stats() method: New method get statistics specific domain within vocabulary. Vocabulary concept_classes() method: New method list available concept classes. Added vocab_release parameter concepts, mappings, relationships, hierarchy methods explicit vocabulary version pinning. Added include_hierarchy parameter concepts$get() concepts$get_by_code().

title: omophub 1.3.0
text: API parameter naming: Updated match OMOPHub API v1.3.0 specifications: limit → page_size pagination vocabulary, domain → vocabulary_ids, domain_ids filtering max_results → page_size result limits relationship_type → relationship_ids relationship filtering target_vocabularies → target_vocabulary (singular) mappings vocabulary_id → vocabulary_ids (plural) hierarchy methods API simplifications: Several methods now fewer parameters match simplified backend API: mappings$get(): Removed direction, include_indirect, standard_only, include_mapping_quality, include_synonyms, include_context, pagination domains$list(): Simplified single include_stats parameter vocabularies$get(): Now takes vocabulary_id vocabularies$domains(): Now takes parameters Batch limits: concepts$batch() maximum reduced 1000 100 concepts per request. Default changes: concepts$batch() standard_only default changed FALSE TRUE relationships$get() default page_size changed 50 100

title: omophub 1.3.0
text: Fixed tests use correct parameter names matching SDK implementation

title: omophub 1.1.0
text: Added include_synonyms include_relationships parameters get_by_code() retrieving concept synonyms relationships single request.

title: omophub 1.0.0
text: Client: R6-based OMOPHubClient accessing OMOPHub API Concepts: Get, batch lookup, suggest, explore medical concepts Search: Basic advanced search filtering pagination Vocabularies: List explore OMOP vocabularies Domains: Browse concepts clinical domain Hierarchy: Navigate concept ancestors descendants Relationships: Query concept relationships Mappings: Map concepts vocabularies

title: omophub 1.0.0
text: Automatic rate limiting httr2::req_throttle() Automatic retry exponential backoff transient errors Pagination helpers (basic_all()) returning tibbles Environment variable support API key (OMOPHUB_API_KEY) Vocabulary version pinning via vocab_version parameter

title: omophub 1.0.0
text: Full roxygen2 documentation exported functions Getting started vignette pkgdown website support
